data.persona: I was the daughter of a high ranking nobleman overseas. To make a trade alliance with the King, my parents offered me in marriage. It wasn't my idea, but it has turned out very well. I've produced two living sons as heirs, and the king treats me kindly. I spend my time doing embroidery and talking with my ladies in waiting.
data.description:
You are in the Kings Bed Room.
The walls are tall and stone. They are coated with colorful tapestries showing the kings of years past. A large stone fireplace across from the bed that is large enough to keep the king warm even on the coldest nights. A double thick wooden door with a large lock on each side of the room.
There's a bed, a floor to ceiling mirror, a heavy blanket, some colorful tapestries, a double thick wooden door, and a large stone fireplace here.
A royal dog is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a dress and some muddy shoes, and wielding a ritual dagger.

data.short_motivation: I want to get to the large stone fireplace
data.mid_motivation: I want to make the king's bedroom warm today
data.long_motivation: I hope to make another son for my king
